top_comments.comment: Also I'm a total liar, my friend Mark just reminded me that I played in a Guildball tournament a couple years ago. That was likely my first tournament, but I forgot. Sorry!

comments_since_last_sample.body: Weird to see me in a video of yours! Granted it was from several years ago! (Adepticon shot)
What zips on the screen at 2:36?  Nj miniac!

The right sort of competitions are a lot of fun and worth anyone playing, the wrong sort give you much the same feeling as self-circumcision, best avoided!  I love the look of this game though, if I had opponents in the Scottish Borders i'd be all over it!  As it is i'll be a slavering spectator as any purchases would just sit in my lead/plastic pile of shame. :(
Did you see the archvillian october release? its all vamps XD tho i guess its nov now...
You showed Conquest! At 7:58 , The knights in blue. The best game ever! 😀👍🏻
